document_data.mainbody: The '''Octagon''' was a huge magical prison located in the [[City of Brass]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: True to its name, the Octagon was in fact shaped like a giant octagon.
document_data.Geography: The Octagon was found within [[Iskalat]], or the fiery dock ward of the City of Brass.
document_data.Activities: The Octagon could easily hold up to 10,000 prisoners at any given time. Each prisoner was kept locked within their own cubed cell of solid [[basalt]] that sealed magically around them, leaving only a tiny slit for air and to pass food through. Impervious to attacks, these cells could only be opened by the [[efreeti]] prison guards.
